sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react' import {makeStyles, createStyles, Theme} from '@material-ui/core/styles' import { Typography, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import IDepartment from '../../server/src/models/catalog/Department' import Link from 'next/link' import ProgramSummary from './ProgramSummary' import { textUpTo } from '../../lib/utilities' type Props = { department: IDepartment } export default function DepartmentBox({ department }: Props) { const classes = makeStyles((theme: Theme) => createStyles({ root: { marginTop: 40, borderBottom: '1px solid #DFDFDF' }, title: { backgroundColor: '#DFDFDF', color: '#000000', fontSize: '10pt', padding: 5, borderRadius: 3, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 15 } }))() const { title, programs } = department return (
{title}
{programs.map(p =>
{p.trainings.map(t =>
{t.title}
{textUpTo(t.description, 180)}
)}
)}
) }
